product_name: Oakley Swim Longboard Hipster Bikini Bottoms - Women's
long_description: Paddle, surf or swim the day away in the comfortable, athletic style of the Oakley Longboard Hipster Bikini Bottoms. Stretchy nylon fabric with stretch-polyester lining keeps up with your every move. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Oakley Longboard Hipster Bikini Bottoms feature low-rise coverage.
short_description: Paddle, surf or swim the day away in the comfortable, athletic style of the Oakley Longboard Hipster Bikini Bottoms.
